testcase.name: Exchange between two threads without timeout
Thread 1 times out but other thread gets in to trade with Thread 2 before Thread's 2 timeout
Thread 3 times out after Thread 1 and Thread 2 exchange values
Exchange between two threads with timeout
Exchange with 4 threads at the same time
Interrupting Thread1 while it's waiting gives interrupted exception
Interrupting Thread 1 while it is waiting for Thread 2 gives interrupted exception and gives null to Thread 2 after timeout
